title: Executive Assistant

This position is for a Hospital in Upland. .Responsibilities:Handle administrative needs of ExecutiveArrange conference calls and meetingsPlan work-related travel detailsReceive visitorsTrain and supervise lower-level clerical staffMaintain and order suppliesâ€‹Qualifications:Previous experience as an executive secretary, administrative assistant, or in other related fieldsStrong organizational skillsAbility to prioritize and multitaskStrong attention to detail
